OTB.Convert: Convert an image to a different format, optionally rescaling the data and/or changing the pixel type.

OTB.SARPolarMatrixConvert: This applications allows converting classical polarimetric matrices to each other.
OTB.ImageClassifier: Performs a classification of the input image according to a model file.
OTB.SFSTextureExtraction: Computes Structural Feature Set textures on every pixel of the input image selected channel
OTB.VectorDataExtractROI: Perform an extract ROI on the input vector data according to the input image extent
OTB.HyperspectralUnmixing: Estimate abundance maps from an hyperspectral image and a set of endmembers.
OTB.HooverCompareSegmentation: Compare two segmentations with Hoover metrics
OTB.ComputeConfusionMatrix: Computes the confusion matrix of a classification
OTB.ConcatenateImages: Concatenate a list of images of the same size into a single multi-channel one.
OTB.SampleAugmentation: Generates synthetic samples from a sample data file.
OTB.HaralickTextureExtraction: Computes Haralick textural features on the selected channel of the input image
OTB.ConvertSensorToGeoPoint: Sensor to geographic coordinates conversion.
OTB.DSFuzzyModelEstimation: Estimate feature fuzzy model parameters using 2 vector data (ground truth samples and wrong samples).
OTB.OrthoRectification: This application allows ortho-rectifying optical and radar images from supported sensors.
OTB.BinaryMorphologicalOperation: Performs morphological operations on an input image channel
OTB.BlockMatching: Performs block-matching to estimate pixel-wise disparities between two images.
OTB.KmzExport: Export the input image in a KMZ product.
OTB.ConnectedComponentSegmentation: Connected component segmentation and object based image filtering of the input image according to user-defined criterions.
OTB.TrainImagesClassifier: Train a classifier from multiple pairs of images and training vector data.
OTB.MultivariateAlterationDetector: Change detection by Multivariate Alteration Detector (MAD) algorithm
OTB.ComputePolylineFeatureFromImage: This application computes the chosen descriptors for each studied polyline contained in the input VectorData.
OTB.MultiImageSamplingRate: Compute sampling rate for an input set of images.
OTB.Segmentation: Performs segmentation of an image, and output either a raster or a vector file. In vector mode, large input datasets are supported.
OTB.VectorDataDSValidation: Vector data validation based on the fusion of features using Dempster-Shafer evidence theory framework.
OTB.OGRLayerClassifier: Classify an OGR layer based on a machine learning model and a list of features to consider.
OTB.OSMDownloader: Download vector data from OSM and store it to file
OTB.DisparityMapToElevationMap: Projects a disparity map into a regular elevation map.
OTB.VectorClassifier: Performs a classification of the input vector data according to a model file.
OTB.ObtainUTMZoneFromGeoPoint: UTM zone determination from a geographic point.
OTB.GeneratePlyFile: Generate a 3D Ply file from a DEM and a color image.
OTB.StereoRectificationGridGenerator: Generates two deformation fields to resample in epipolar geometry, a pair of stereo images up to the sensor model precision
OTB.SARDeburst: This application performs deburst of Sentinel1 IW SLC images by removing redundant lines.
OTB.SampleExtraction: Extracts samples values from an image.
OTB.MorphologicalProfilesAnalysis: Performs morphological profiles analysis on an input image channel.
OTB.MeanShiftSmoothing: This application smooths an image using the MeanShift algorithm.
OTB.ConvertCartoToGeoPoint: Convert cartographic coordinates to geographic ones.
OTB.VectorDataTransform: Apply a transform to each vertex of the input VectorData
OTB.FusionOfClassifications: Fuses several classifications maps of the same image on the basis of class labels.
OTB.VectorDataSetField: Set a field in vector data.
OTB.GridBasedImageResampling: Resamples an image according to a resampling grid
OTB.SARPolarSynth: Gives, for each pixel, the power that would have been received by a SAR system with a basis different from the classical (H,V) one (polarimetric synthetis).
OTB.GrayScaleMorphologicalOperation: Performs morphological operations on a grayscale input image
OTB.ReadImageInfo: Get information about the image
OTB.LSMSVectorization: This application performs the fourth step of the exact Large-Scale Mean-Shift segmentation workflow [1].
OTB.FineRegistration: Estimate disparity map between two images.
OTB.GenerateRPCSensorModel: Generate a RPC sensor model from a list of Ground Control Points.
OTB.DomainTransform: Domain Transform application for wavelet and fourier
OTB.RefineSensorModel: Perform least-square fit of a sensor model to a set of tie points
OTB.ComputeImagesStatistics: Computes global mean and standard deviation for each band from a set of images and optionally saves the results in an XML file.
OTB.BandMath: Outputs a monoband image which is the result of a mathematical operation on several multi-band images.
OTB.RigidTransformResample: Resample an image with a rigid transform

OTB.SARCalibration: Perform radiometric calibration of SAR images. Following sensors are supported: TerraSAR-X, Sentinel1 and Radarsat-2.Both Single Look Complex(SLC) and detected products are supported as input.
OTB.Smoothing: Apply a smoothing filter to an image
OTB.TileFusion: Fusion of an image made of several tile files.
OTB.ColorMapping: Maps an input label image to 8-bits RGB using look-up tables.
OTB.Superimpose: Using available image metadata, project one image onto another one
OTB.ClassificationMapRegularization: Filters the input labeled image using Majority Voting in a ball shaped neighbordhood.
OTB.DynamicConvert: Change the pixel type and rescale the image's dynamic
OTB.Rescale: Rescale the image between two given values.
OTB.Quicklook: Generates a subsampled version of an image extract
OTB.ExtractROI: Extract a ROI defined by the user.
OTB.PolygonClassStatistics: Computes statistics on a training polygon set.
OTB.DEMConvert: Converts a geo-referenced DEM image into a general raster file compatible with OTB DEM handling.
OTB.MultiResolutionPyramid: Build a multi-resolution pyramid of the image.
OTB.LSMSSegmentation: This application performs the second step of the exact Large-Scale Mean-Shift segmentation workflow (LSMS) [1].
OTB.Despeckle: Perform speckle noise reduction on SAR image.
OTB.TrainVectorClassifier: Train a classifier based on labeled geometries and a list of features to consider.
OTB.SampleSelection: Selects samples from a training vector data set.
OTB.VertexComponentAnalysis: Given a set of mixed spectral vectors, estimatereference substances also known as endmembers using the VertexComponent Analysis algorithm.
OTB.SplitImage: Split a N multiband image into N images.
OTB.DownloadSRTMTiles: Download or list SRTM tiles
OTB.ComputeOGRLayersFeaturesStatistics: Compute statistics of the features in a set of OGR Layers
OTB.LSMSSmallRegionsMerging: This application performs the third (optional) step of the exact Large-Scale Mean-Shift segmentation workflow [1].
OTB.PixelValue: Get the value of a pixel.
OTB.MorphologicalClassification: Performs morphological convex, concave and flat classification on an input image channel
OTB.TrainRegression: Train a classifier from multiple images to perform regression.

OTB.ContrastEnhancement: This application is the implementation of the histogram equalization algorithm. It can be used to enhance contrast in an image or to reduce the dynamic of the image without losing too much contrast. It offers several options as a no data value, a contrast limitation factor, a local version of the algorithm and also a mode to equalize the luminance of the image.
OTB.SARDecompositions: From one-band complex images (each one related to an element of the Sinclair matrix), returns the selected decomposition.
OTB.EdgeExtraction: This application computes edge features on every pixel of the input image selected channel
OTB.VectorDataReprojection: Reproject a vector data using support image projection reference, or a user specified map projection
OTB.ComputeModulusAndPhase: This application computes the modulus and the phase of a complex SAR image.
OTB.LineSegmentDetection: Detect line segments in raster
OTB.LocalStatisticExtraction: Computes local statistical moments on every pixel in the selected channel of the input image
